text: Threshold is a 1981 Canadian science fiction drama movie directed by Richard Pearce and starring Donald Sutherland, Jeff Goldblum, Sharon Acker, Mare Winningham, John Marley, Allan Nicholls. ==Other websites== * Category:1981 drama movies Category:1981 science fiction movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Canadian science fiction movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Pearce
title: Threshold (1981 movie)
